Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Door
    The class Door stores the information about one of the door: does it have the prize behind it? Is it open or closed? Was it selected by the player? It provides other objects access to these information through some setters and getters.
    MontyHall
    The class MontyHall simulates one or several games.
    Statistics
    The class Statistics accumulates information about a series of games: Number of game played Number of times the switching strategy was successful Number of times the switching strategy was not successful Number of times each door has the prize behind it Number of times each door was chosen by the player Number of times each door was open by the host
    StudentInfo
    Contains a method void display() that all the main methods call to display the student information.
